name: Are You Smarter Than Fifth Grade Demons?
name_original: Are You Smarter Than Fifth Grade Demons?
description:
This is a BugBakerGames parody game, completed in just two days.

You're stuck in a short game of Are you smarter than a 5th grader. All you have is yourself and your knowledge. The catch is, you will have no 5th graders to cheat off of.  Can you answer all of the easy 5th grade questions and escape death? 

SFX- Fesliyan Studios, bugbakergames

Everything else- bugbakergames

WARNING: may contain jumpscares
